Dachande:

     He still knew Battera's private comm line, so typing that in and 
decloaking he sent a message. "Battera, it's me, Dach...CyberShark. 
I'm sending you my coordinates to you, come and meet me if you like."
     After sending the message he set up a couple of remote weapons, 
just incase Battera brought unwanted guests. He stood in the center 
of the weapons and waited.
